Header.location: At the top of the page
Header.description: Title, Search Input, Icon and Dropdowns in flex container

Sidebar.description: List items in the container, Dropdown and Button

CTA.description: contains icon and text in flex container

Elements.description: contains Input elements, RadioGroup, Select elements, Textarea, Checkbox

Input.location: at the top in the container, one below the another

RadioGroup.description: contains three, Input with type radio with its respective Label elements

Select.description: contains several option elements to select with in them

Checkbox.description: contains Input with type checkbox with its respective Label

Validation.description: contains three Input elements with their respective Label

Icons.description: contains two Label elements with input and icon inside them

Buttons.location: at the bottom in the content section
Buttons.description: contains two Label elements with input and button inside them
